[36m# Project information for page publishing[39m
[36mprojectName: web-smith-demo[39m
[36mprojectDesc: ""[39m
[36mprojectLogo: ""[39m
[36mprojectId: 3c7be939-0133-4d52-8bad-021ee546eaae[39m
[36mprojectSlug: web-smith-demo[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# =============================================================================[39m
[36m# Website Configuration[39m
[36m# =============================================================================[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Purpose: What's the main outcome you want readers to achieve?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   landingPage      - Landing page / Homepage: Convert visitors into users or customers[39m
[36m#   ecommerce        - E-commerce / Online store: Sell products or services online[39m
[36m#   portfolio        - Portfolio / Showcase: Display creative work, projects, or achievements[39m
[36m#   corporate        - Corporate / Business: Professional business website with company informa

tion[39m
[36m#   blog             - Blog / Content site: Share articles, news, and regular content updates[39m
[36m#   saas             - SaaS / Software product: Promote and onboard users to software services[39m
[36m#   nonprofit        - Non-profit / Community: Promote causes, accept donations, engage volunteers[39m
[36m#   education        - Educational / Learning: Provide courses, tutorials, or educational content[39m
[36m#   mixedPurpose     - Multi-purpose website: Comprehensive website covering multiple needs[39m
[36mpagePurpose:[39m
[36m  - landingPage[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Target Audience: Who will be reading this most often?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   customers        - Customers / End users: People who buy or use your products/services[39m
[36m#   businessOwners   - Business owners / Entrepreneurs: People running businesses looking for solutions[39m
[36m#   marketers        - Marketing teams: People promoting produc

ts or managing campaigns[39m
[36m#   designers        - Designers / Creative professionals: People focused on visual design and user experience[39m
[36m#   developers       - Developers / Technical users: People building or integrating technical solutions[39m
[36m#   investors        - Investors / Stakeholders: People evaluating business potential and growth[39m
[36m#   jobSeekers       - Job seekers / Potential employees: People looking for career opportunities[39m
[36m#   students         - Students / Learners: People seeking educational content or resources[39m
[36m#   generalPublic    - General public / Mixed audience: Broad audience with varied interests and backgrounds[39m
[36mtargetAudienceTypes:[39m
[36m  - customers[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Website Scale: How many pages should your website have?[39m
[36m# Available options (uncomment and modify as needed):[39m
[36m#   singlePage         - Single Page (only 1 page): All content consolidated into 1 page[39m
[36m#   mini

mal            - Minimal (2-6 pages): Core pages only - quick to launch[39m
[36m#   standard           - Standard (7-12 pages): Complete website with main sections [RECOMMENDED][39m
[36m#   comprehensive      - Comprehensive (12+ pages): Full-featured website with detailed sections[39m
[36m#   aiDecide           - Let AI decide: Analyze project complexity and suggest appropriate scale[39m
[36mwebsiteScale: singlePage[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Custom Rules: Define specific page generation rules and requirements[39m
[36mrules: ""[39m
[36m[39m
[36m# Glossary: Define project-specific terms and definitions[39m
[36m# glossary: "@glossary.md"  # Path to markdown file containing glossary definitions[39m
[36m[39m
[36mlocale: en[39m
[36m# translateLanguages:  # List of languages to translate the pages to[39m
[36m#   - zh  # Example: Chinese translation[39m
[36m#   - en  # Example: English translation[39m
[36mpagesDir: .aigne/web-smith/pages  # Directory to save generated pages[

39m
[36msourcesPath:  # Source code paths to analyze[39m
[36m  - ./src[39m
[36mdefaultDatasources:  # Default datasources included in every page[39m
[36m  - ./media.md[39m
[36m# minImageWidth: Only images wider than this value (in pixels) will be used in page generation[39m
[36mmedia:[39m
[36m  minImageWidth: 800[39m
[36m[39m
üí° You can edit the configuration file anytime to modify settings.
üöÄ Run [36m'aigne web generate'[39m to start website generation!
